alert.note: Alert for Gates of the Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:22AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
